name: Action Kite (Prototype)
description:
Action Kite is a submission to the month-long Devtober 2021 game jam. It's a 2D arcade action game about flying a smiley pinkish kite friend around treacherous frowning shuriken objects while collecting PUMPKINS to get points (well that's what it's about in the prototype anyway).

I'd love to hear any feedback or ideas you have, as Action Kite is currently just a baby prototype which must grow STRONGER.

Features

- Kite

- Kiteman (that's the stick man's name)

- Action

Controls

Left & Right Arrow Keys: Move Left and Right

Up & Down Arrow Keys: Move Kite Up and Down

R Key: Reset Game
